column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As for the deep dish pizza
column2: the Lou was a combination of spinach mix
column4: and sliced roma tomatoes covered with blend of mozzarella
column6: and cheddar cheese on garlic buttercrust. I think the veggie toppings were not exactly my favorite choice
column7: especially with sliced tomatoes on top so I was already a bit put off. As a cheese lover
column8: I found that the cheese was too excessive and stringy as well. I only had one slice and had to call it quits.
